Creditor, Recovery Management Systems Corporation, Request for Notices (Singh, Ramesh) (Entered: 12/22/2009)

Chapter 7 Trustee's Report of No Distribution: having been appointed trustee of the estate of the above-named debtor(s), report that I have neither received any property nor paid any money on account of this estate; that I have made a diligent inquiry into the financial affairs of the debtor(s) and the location of the property belonging to the estate; and that there is no property available for distribution from the estate over and above that exempted by law. Pursuant to Fed R Bank P 5009, I hereby certify that the estate of the above-named debtor(s) has been fully administered. I request that I be discharged from any further duties as trustee. Key information about this case as reported in schedules filed by the debtor(s) or otherwise found in the case record: This case was pending for 2 months. Assets Abandoned: $ 45627.22, Assets Exempt (without deducting any secured claims): $ 11974.05, Claims Scheduled: $ 94188.00, Claims Asserted: Not Applicable, Claims scheduled to be discharged without payment (without deducting the value of collateral or debts excepted from discharge): $ 94188.00. Meeting of Creditors Held and Adjourned. (Strauss, Bruce) (Entered: 01/21/2010)

Motion for Relief from Stay regarding 114 South Ault Street, Moberly, MO 65270, filing fee to be paid in the amount of 150 dollars Filed by Bank of America, N.A.. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit Deed of Trust# 2 Exhibit Note) (Woolverton, Cynthia) (Entered: 02/10/2010)
Receipt of Motion for Relief from Stay(09-51155-jwv7) [motion,mrstay] ( 150.00) Filing Fee. Receipt Number 6643083, Filing Fee Amount 150.00 dollars (U.S. Treasury) (Entered: 02/10/2010)

Notice and Order Setting Hearing on Motion for Relief from Stay re: 114 South Ault Street, Moberly, MO 65270, Filed by Bank of America, N.A. Debtor is directed to file an objection/response by the due date. If no objections are timely filed, the Court may enter an Order without further notice. MOVANT must serve paper copies of all documents evidencing perfection of security interest on the Trustee and Debtors counsel at the time of filing the motion or promptly thereafter. Service should be certified on the motion. Failure to serve paper copies may result in delaying the hearing or in dismissal of the motion. At least 3 days before the hearing, parties must exchange exhibits and file and serve witness/exhibit lists. Failure to comply may result in exclusion of evidence at the hearing. Failure to file the certificate of service before the scheduled hearing date may result in delay in the entry of an appropriate order or denial of the motion. So ORDERED by /s/Jerry W. Venters. THE AUTOMATIC STAY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MODIFIED OR VACATED BY THE COURT. If an Objection is filed the hearing will be held as follows. (related document(s) 19 ) Hearing scheduled for 3/9/2010 at 01:30 PM at US Courthouse, Courtroom 6A, 400 E. 9th St., Kansas City, MO.Responses due by 2/26/2010. (Hinkle, Jamie)THE MOVING PARTY IS TO SERVE THIS ORDER ON PARTIES NOT RECEIVING ELECTRONIC NOTICE.File the Certificate of Service and relate it to the epo category.This Notice of Electronic Filing is the Official ORDER for this entry. No document is attached. (Entered: 02/12/2010)
